desc: Basic English-language questions about dolphin facts.

questions.prompt: Do river dolphins live in [saltwater] or [freshwater]?
How many fins does a typical dolphin have?
What is the name of the hole dolphins use to breathe?
Are dolphins known for being [smart] or [slow-witted]?
How many eyes do dolphins have?
Are dolphins usually [friendly] or [aggressive] towards humans?
Do dolphins communicate with each other?
